tasks.task: Please confirm you received this message

Hi UC,

Please clone the main repository into the projects-master directory on the host system. Having the repository checked out there will place all code files on the filesystem, allowing the user to open files directly and copy/paste code snippets into their editor or the chat interface. For example, you can run:

  cd /path/to/projects-master
  git clone <repository-url> .

Thanks!

completed.task: Please clone the repository and set up access so the user can directly copy/paste text from the code
